channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Chat Bubble – Floating Chat with Contact Chat Icons, Messages, Telegram, Email, SMS, Call me back
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Chat Bubble – Floating Chat with Contact Chat Icons, Messages, Telegram, Email, SMS, Call me back

item.title: CVE-2022-3415|2024-08-03T01:07:06.696Z -- unknown -- chat%20bubble%20%E2%80%93%20floating%20chat%20with%20contact%20chat%20icons%2C%20messages%2C%20telegram%2C%20email%2C%20sms%2C%20call%20me%20back
item.description: The Chat Bubble WordPress plugin before 2.3 does not sanitise and escape some contact parameters, which could allow unauthenticated attackers to set Stored Cross-Site Scripting payloads in them, which will trigger when an admin view the related contact message
